include.name: PreplayMenu
include.control: Play/browse to Show 60 216--> 0 center center grey white $VAR[Preplay_PlayResumeButtonVar] font15 80 Plex.PlayWith(VideoDefaultPlayer) $VAR[Colour_PreplayHighlightColourVar]
Audio 60 216--> 0 center center grey white $LOCALIZE[292] font15 80 Skin.SetString(DialogPos,audiostreampicker) Skin.Reset(DialogPos) ActivateWindow(10205) $VAR[Colour_PreplayHighlightColourVar]

Ratings 60 216--> 0 center center grey white $LOCALIZE[42029] font15 80 ActivateWindow(10200,$INFO[ListItem(0).Path]) Skin.SetString(DialogPos,rate) Skin.Reset(DialogPos) $VAR[Colour_PreplayHighlightColourVar]
Mark as Unwatched 60 216--> 0 center center grey white $LOCALIZE[31138] font15 80 markasunwatched ListItem.Status(watched) $VAR[Colour_PreplayHighlightColourVar]
